EmailTemplate.name: Change Request - UTMA
EmailTemplate.subject: Axos Bank Inquiry {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
We have received your request to convert your account. Only Savings type accounts can be converted into an account for your minor. This will be a two-step process:
Step 1: Complete the Change Request: Uniform Transfers to Minors form.
Step 2: Return the completed Beneficiary request forms for processing by:
Secure Message: Login to Online Banking, click on Contact Us, and send a secure email with a scanned copy of the signed documents. Fax to: 858-350-0443; or Mail to: Axos Bank Deposit Operations: New Accounts PO BOX 509127 San Diego, CA 92150-9948
Your change will be reviewed within three business days of receipt of the Account Vesting Change form.
We appreciate your business and commit to providing superior Banking products, support and services.
Best Regards,
{!User.FirstName} Axos Bank Customer Service
